title: Protest sites continue to stand, continues demands
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The people’s protest at the site dubbed as ‘GotaGoGama’, in front of the President’s Office in Colombo continues, calling on President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to resign.
Large crowds including civil activists gathered at the protest site last night as well.
The Federation of University Teachers Association (FUTA) marched from Colpetty junction to GotaGoGama at the Galle Face Green yesterday (06).
The demonstrations staged at the protest site dubbed ‘MainaGoGama’, in front of the Temple Trees also continued, calling on Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa to resign.
Crowds were also seen gathered at ‘HoruGoGama’ near the Parliament until late night yesterday (06).
Colombo – Negombo road obstructed due to protest demanding LP gas
